== Annotation-based Mocking ==

=== Quick summary ===

  # Use `@PowerMockTestListener(AnnotationEnabler.class)` at the class-level of your test to enable the annotation support.
    # Use `@Mock` on a field to allow PowerMock to create and inject a mock of the same type as the field.
    # Use `@MockNice` on a field to allow PowerMock to create and inject a nice mock of the same type as the fieldprivate constructor.
    # Use `@MockStrict` on a field to allow PowerMock to create and inject a strict mock of the same type as the field
    # Use `@Mock("methodName")` on a field to allow PowerMock to create and inject a partial mock of the same type as the field mocking only the method called `methodName`.
